metadata.title: CVE-2022-2469 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
GNU SASL libgsasl server-side read-out-of-bounds with maliciousauthenticated GSS-API client

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gsasl - 2.2.0-1ubuntu1
gsasl-common - 2.2.0-1ubuntu1
libgsasl18 - 2.2.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gsasl package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-1ubuntu1').
